description: This Java class defines a REST controller `UploadController` for handling file uploads of resumes and job descriptions, triggering parsing and storage operations within a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: UploadController
classes.description: REST controller managing file uploads for resumes and job descriptions, including parsing and persistence operations.

methods.name: uploadResume
methods.description: Handles POST request to upload a resume, stores the file, creates an Upload record, and triggers resume parsing and persistence.

methods.name: uploadJob
methods.description: Handles POST request to upload a job description, stores the file, creates an Upload record, and triggers job description parsing and persistence.
